title: Facebook Locks Down Privacy, But Lawmakers Demand the Key
text: Facebook is in the spotlight again due to privacy concerns. For shareholders that is finally a good thing.

title: Key Words: ‘Facebook is the new cigarettes for our society,’ Marc Benioff says, calling for regulation
text: Salesforce founder rips Facebook and again calls for the social-network giant — which has been wracked by scandals in recent years — to be regulated or split up.
